answers.answer: My mom is a big woman, did not show and i was 9# 2oz but big babies run in my family. It all depends on genetics.

Being big doesn't mean you'll have a big baby. Most of the women in my family are tiny and still do. My mother is 5'2" and was barely 100 lbs when wet... popped out 5 kids.. each of us 10-12 lbs each and she did it naturally. In our area 8-9 lb babies are normal and we don't consider them large until they reach 10lbs or more. My husbands family is all large women who have tiny babies at 6lbs or less... you may have a large child if your blood sugar stays high or if you end up on insulin (that stuff is steroids for babies) but as long as you keep it stable you probably won't have a problem.

I'm bigger an with my first he was 7, 10.6 oz.I'm only 21 wks with this an she's just at 14 oz. If you don't have any health issues then I'd say your baby will be normal size. I wouldn't say its a large baby til like 9/10 lbs or more.

I was 320 lbs when I delivered my first she was 9.6 lbs but I had GD but before this pregnancy I lost  140 lbs and it's a world of difference!  No sickness this time and I carry the pregnancy a lot better but now u know what u gotta do after ur baby comes .....it's good to b get healthy so he will have u forever! I van wait to have this one and drop the 20 lbs I've gained and I'm only 21.3 wks! By the time I'm done it will be 40lbs! But u will be fine I got a epidural and everything went smoothly!  Big babies r from diabetes!  Not heavy moms! Ur going to be ok! He's coming no matter what size! :)

question: Before I became pregnant I had already put on a lot of weight, I was 250. Now at 33 weeks I'm almost 300 lbs but I don't look it. I don't even look pregant. I'm 5'8 and have a weird body shape where I'm small up top and large on the bottom. Besides me gaining so much weight im healthy; no high blood pressure/ diabetes or anything of that sort. I'm determined to loose the weight once my baby is here (don't like being fat) but I'm afraid that my son will be more than 8lbs.. can any heavy mom's share some in sight on this?
title: fat mommy sacred of large baby.
